title: [GAMEPLAY] Forecast Janna joke has double voice-over
body:
The joke plays skins quote and original skins quote at the same time. Every other VO seems normal. (The taunt in video doesn't play the quote because I did it too early, it works normally otherwise).

1. pick Forecast Janna
2. go into any game 
3. press crtl+1 (joke)

Happened in normal game, was able to replicate it in custom game. It happens every time.

replies.body:
Hey ponywithhiccups - 

Thanks for the awesome bug report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix! ^-^
